attributes.additional_details:
We deplore the proposed increases to the retirement age,as currently proposed ,by the Coalition.

 We implore the Govt. to introduce transitional relief for all people currently over the age of 50+,who will by unfairly impacted upon by these changes.This particularly will hit femails hard ,with many  unable to change the plans that they had made ,for expected retirement at aged 60.
                                     Many will face a bleak and impoverished old,without transitional relief.
